name: Tobarinker
storyline: Simple single-screen action game with the goal of protecting allies and defeating bosses.
summary: Rare off-shoot of Ruminant Whimper's "Hellsinker" (which is a spiritual sequel to "Radio Zonde") like D.N.A. Software's "Shaftdiver", this is a simple single-screen action game with the goal of protecting allies and defeating bosses. It had a very small production run released back in 2010 as Trickster Jam's first game project, the creator disappeared shortly afterwards.
